name: Meggu
greetingText: I'm so lucky to have met such an amazing and beautiful person like you
wishText: May your smile always be as bright as the flowers on your head, and may your beautiful smile bloom like flowers forever. May you always be happy!
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday! May happiness and smiles stay with you foreverâ€¦
text2: I want you to feel excited...
text4: I knew I had to do something
replayText: If you liked it, you can watch it again by clicking here...
